In reply to your letter,
look for letter in outwards
referring to my proposal of issuing sets of plants for educational purposes, I have the honor of now submitting to you a few samples to indicate the form of the publication and the manner in which it might be carried out.
See Lucas, Maroske & Brown-May (2006), pp. 34-6, and Maroske (2007).

div.p:
Minister of the Lands Department
Casey noted on 19 August 1872: 'Ack & say that as soon as I can obtain a little spare time I would like to have an interview with the Govt Botanist upon this & other subjects connected with the gardens'. This response was communicated in C. Hodgkinson to M, 21 August 1872 (in this edition as 72-08-21b).
